code: import{useState}from'react';import{useInterval}from'./useTimer';export const DEFAULT_BLINKING_SPEED=500;export const DEFAULT_CURSOR_SYMBOL='|';export function Cursor({cursorSymbol=DEFAULT_CURSOR_SYMBOL,delay=DEFAULT_BLINKING_SPEED}){const[visibleFlag,setFlag]=useState(true);useInterval(()=>setFlag(flag=>!flag),delay);return visibleFlag?cursorSymbol:'';}
